results.title: Tumoricidal Activity of Simvastatin in Synergy with RhoA Inactivation in Antimigration of Clear Cell Renal Cell Carcinoma Cells
results.text_hl: @GENE_RHOA @GENE_387 @@@RhoA@@@ inactivation by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was correlated with decreased cell @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@metastasis@@@ in the transwell assay, which was mimicked in dominantly negative @GENE_RHOA @GENE_387 @@@RhoA@@@-overexpressing cells.

citations.NLM: Lee YG, Chou FN, Tung SY, Chou HC, Ko TL, Fann YC, Juan SH. Tumoricidal Activity of Simvastatin in Synergy with RhoA Inactivation in Antimigration of Clear Cell Renal Cell Carcinoma Cells Int J Mol Sci. 2023 Jun 4;24(11):. PMID: 37298689

results.title: Targeted Codelivery of Prodigiosin and Simvastatin Using Smart BioMOF: Functionalization by Recombinant Anti-VEGFR1 scFv
results.text_hl: Smart co-delivery of @CHEMICAL_Prodigiosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011353 @@@PG@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ on BioMOF nanoparticles had synergistic effects on growth inhibition and prevented @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ cell @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@metastasis@@@.

results.title: Low-dose photodynamic therapy-induced increase in the metastatic potential of pancreatic tumor cells and its blockade by simvastatin.
results.text_hl: Since @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was reported to improve the survival of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Pancreatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D010190 @@@pancreatic tumors@@@ at an early stage and suppress the @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@metastasis@@@ of most @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancers@@@, we utilized it during YLG-1-PDT and discovered alleviated migration/invasion, @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@metastasis@@@ and @GENE_MMP2 @GENE_4313;4318 @@@MMP-2/9@@@ expression.

citations.NLM: Shen Y, Li M, Sun F, Zhang Y, Qu C, Zhou M, Shen F, Xu L. Low-dose photodynamic therapy-induced increase in the metastatic potential of pancreatic tumor cells and its blockade by simvastatin. J Photochem Photobiol B. 2020 Jun;207():111889. PMID: 32402990

results.title: Simvastatin Possesses Antitumor and Differentiation-Promoting Properties That Affect Stromal Cells in Giant Cell Tumor of Bone.
results.text_hl: These findings support further clinical investigation of the efficacy of using @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ as an adjuvant therapy for @DISEASE_Giant_Cell_Tumor_of_Bone @DISEASE_MESH:D018212 @@@GCTB@@@ to reduce recurrence and distant @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@metastasis@@@ after surgical treatment.   2019 Orthopedic Research Society.

results.title: Impact of Disease and Treatment Response in Drug-Drug Interaction Studies: Osimertinib and Simvastatin in Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
results.text_hl: High @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ exposure on D1 likely resulted from impairment of hepatic first pass metabolism due to @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@liver metastases@@@.

results.title: Organ-specific cholesterol metabolic aberration fuels liver metastasis of colorectal cancer
results.text_hl: The in vivo efficacy of inhibition of @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ biosynthesis pathway by @CHEMICAL_betulin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C002503 @@@betulin@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ were evaluated in experimental @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@metastasis@@@ models.

results.title: MYBL2 disrupts the Hippo-YAP pathway and confers castration resistance and metastatic potential in prostate cancer
results.text_hl: To evaluate the effect of @CHEMICAL_Verteporfin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077362 @@@Verteporfin@@@ (Sigma-Aldrich) or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ (Sigma-Aldrich) on castration-resistant growth and @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@bone metastasis@@@ in vivo, @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@-bearing @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ were randomly grouped and treated with @CHEMICAL_Verteporfin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077362 @@@Verteporfin@@@ (100 mg/kg body weight, every 2 days, intraperitoneal injection) or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ (5 mg/kg body weight, 5 days a week, intraperitoneal injection) alone.

results.title: BBB-penetrating codelivery liposomes treat brain metastasis of non-small cell lung cancer with EGFRT790M mutation
results.text_hl: However, there are two big challenges against effective therapy--the secondary @GENE_EGFR @GENE_1956 @@@EGFR@@@ mutation-associated TKI resistance and @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@brain metastasis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@BMs@@@) of @DISEASE_Lung_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D008175 @@@lung cancer@@@.

results.text_hl: @GENE_PECAM1 @GENE_18613 @@@CD31@@@ staining showed that HPK-@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment decreased blood vessel density in @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@lung metastases@@@ (Figure 6D).
